CustomField.formula: IF (Text( Cycle__c) = "January", 1, IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "February", 2, IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "March", 3,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "April", 4,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "May", 5,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "June", 6, IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "July", 7,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "August", 8,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "September", 9,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "October", 10,IF ( Text( Cycle__c) = "November", 11, 12)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month
